Lawrence.Holt Farm (Andover, Massachusetts): Holt Farm is a historic farm built in 1714 by Nicholas Holt's (1) grandson Timothy Holt (3) and located at 89 Prospect Road in Andover, Massachusetts. The house was built on the highest point in Essex County on land granted in Nicholas Holt (1). In Colonial times the Hill was referred to as Holt Hill but was changed in the late 19th Century to Prospect Hill, but reverted to its original name in the early 20th Century..6ed.
